Structs/TallyLight.html.name: TallyLight
Structs/TallyLight.html.abstract: Describes the state of a tally light. Possible values are

Protocols/SwitcherConnections.html#/s:4A.name: send(_:)
Protocols/SwitcherConnections.html#/s:4A.abstract: Queues a message to be sent to all connected controllers.

Protocols/SwitcherConnections.html#/s:4A.name: when(_:)
Protocols/SwitcherConnections.html#/s:4A.abstract: Attaches a message handler to a concrete Message type. Every time a message of this type comes in, the provided handler will be called with two parameters: the message itself and the origin of the message.

Protocols/SerializableMessage.html#/s:4A.name: dataBytes
Protocols/SerializableMessage.html#/s:4A.abstract: The part of the serialized message starting after the 4 Message.title bytes.

Protocols/DeserializableMessage.html#/s:.name: title
Protocols/DeserializableMessage.html#/s:.abstract: The title of the message. This is referred to as CMD in Skarhoj’s protocol documentation

Protocols/DeserializableMessage.html#/s:.name: init(with:)
Protocols/DeserializableMessage.html#/s:.abstract: Initialize a new message from the given binary string

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.name: send(_:)
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.abstract: Sends a message to the connected switcher.

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.name: whenDisconnected
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.abstract: A function that will be called when the connection is lost

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.name: whenError
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.abstract: A function that will be called when an error occurs

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.name: when(_:)
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html#/s:4.abstract: Attaches a message handler to a concrete Message type. Every time a message of this type comes in, the provided handler will be called.

Protocols/ControllerConnection.html.name: ControllerConnection
Protocols/ControllerConnection.html.abstract: A connection of a controller to a switcher. Use it to interact with the switcher: send messages and attach message handlers for incoming Messages.

Protocols/DeserializableMessage.html.name: DeserializableMessage
Protocols/DeserializableMessage.html.abstract: A message that can be constructed from a sequence of bytes (ArraySlice<UInt8>)

Protocols/SerializableMessage.html.name: SerializableMessage
Protocols/SerializableMessage.html.abstract: A Message that is serializable. In other words: that can be transformed into a binary format, ready to be sent to another device.

Enums/VideoSource/DidChangeProperties.ht.name: DidChangeProperties
Enums/VideoSource/DidChangeProperties.ht.abstract: The properties (like name and port types) of a video source

Enums/Message/Config/MultiView.html#/s:4.name: inputCount
Enums/Message/Config/MultiView.html#/s:4.abstract: The number inputs that are included in the multiview

Enums/Message/Config/MultiView.html#/s:4.name: multiviewCount
Enums/Message/Config/MultiView.html#/s:4.abstract: The number multiviews that can be generated

Enums/Message/Config/MediaPool.html#/s:4.name: stillCapacity
Enums/Message/Config/MediaPool.html#/s:4.abstract: The number of stills that can be stored

Enums/Message/Config/MediaPool.html#/s:4.name: clipCapacity
Enums/Message/Config/MediaPool.html#/s:4.abstract: The number of clips that can be stored

Enums/Message/Config/MixEffect.html#/s:4.name: block
Enums/Message/Config/MixEffect.html#/s:4.abstract: The block index. Starts counting at 0 so first block is 0

Enums/Message/Config/MixEffect.html#/s:4.name: numberOfKeyers
Enums/Message/Config/MixEffect.html#/s:4.abstract: The number of keyers on this block

Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html#/s:4A.name: downstreamKeyers
Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html#/s:4A.abstract: Number of downstream keyers. Tested using simulator and v8.2.1

Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html#/s:4A.name: mediaPlayers
Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html#/s:4A.abstract: Number of media players. Tested using simulator and v8.2.1

Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html#/s:4A.name: maxHyperdecks
Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html#/s:4A.abstract: Maximum number of linked hyperdecks. Tested using simulator and v8.2.1

Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html#/s:4A.name: unknownB
Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html#/s:4A.abstract: Unknown property, it might be the number of Digital Video Effects aka *DVE*s

Enums/Message/Config/ProtocolVersion.htm.name: ProtocolVersion
Enums/Message/Config/ProtocolVersion.htm.abstract: There are two version numbers in ATEM world: One for the ATEM Software Control application (for instance version 6.0), which is what people usually refer to, and one for the firmware which is often updated with the PC/Mac application versions (for instance 2.15). The latter version number is what “_ver” gives you and a number you can not find anywhere in the application to our knowledge.

Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html.name: Topology
Enums/Message/Config/Topology.html.abstract: The topology of an atem describes all its resources: inputs, outputs, generators, etc.

Enums/Message/Config/InitiationComplete..name: InitiationComplete
Enums/Message/Config/InitiationComplete..abstract: Informs a controller that a connection is succesfully established.

Enums/Message/Did/GetSourceTallies.html#.name: tallies
Enums/Message/Did/GetSourceTallies.html#.abstract: The state of the tally lights for each source of the Atem switcher

Enums/Message/Did/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput..name: source
Enums/Message/Did/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput..abstract: The source that has been routed to the auxiliary output

Enums/Message/Did/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput..name: output
Enums/Message/Did/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput..abstract: The auxiliary output that has received another route

Enums/Message/Did/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput..name: init(source:output:)
Enums/Message/Did/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput..abstract: Create a message to inform that a source has been routed to an auxiliary output

Enums/Message/Did/ChangePreviewBus.html.name: ChangePreviewBus
Enums/Message/Did/ChangePreviewBus.html.abstract: Informs a controller that the preview bus has changed

Enums/Message/Did/ChangeProgramBus.html.name: ChangeProgramBus
Enums/Message/Did/ChangeProgramBus.html.abstract: Informs a controller that the program bus has changed

Enums/Message/Did/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput..name: ChangeAuxiliaryOutput
Enums/Message/Did/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput..abstract: Informs a controller that a source has been routed to an auxiliary output

Enums/Message/Did/GetTimecode.html.name: GetTimecode
Enums/Message/Did/GetTimecode.html.abstract: Informs a controller that the switchers timecode has changed

Enums/Message/Did/ChangeTransitionPositi.name: ChangeTransitionPosition
Enums/Message/Did/ChangeTransitionPositi.abstract: Informs the controller that the transition position has changed

Enums/Message/Did/GetSourceTallies.html.name: GetSourceTallies
Enums/Message/Did/GetSourceTallies.html.abstract: Informs a controller that the some tally lights might have changed.

Enums/Message/Do/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.h.name: source
Enums/Message/Do/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.h.abstract: The source that should be assigned to the auxiliary output

Enums/Message/Do/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.h.name: output
Enums/Message/Do/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.h.abstract: The auxiliary output that should be rerouted

Enums/Message/Do/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.h.name: init(_:to:)
Enums/Message/Do/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.h.abstract: Create a message to reroute an auxiliary output.

Enums/Message/Do/ChangePreviewBus.html.name: ChangePreviewBus
Enums/Message/Do/ChangePreviewBus.html.abstract: Informs a switcher that the preview bus should be changed

Enums/Message/Do/ChangeProgramBus.html.name: ChangeProgramBus
Enums/Message/Do/ChangeProgramBus.html.abstract: Informs a switcher that the program bus shoud be changed

Enums/Message/Do/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.h.name: ChangeAuxiliaryOutput
Enums/Message/Do/ChangeAuxiliaryOutput.h.abstract: Informs a switcher that a source should be assigned to the specified auxiliary output

Enums/Message/Do/ChangeTransitionPositio.name: ChangeTransitionPosition
Enums/Message/Do/ChangeTransitionPositio.abstract: Informs the switcher that it should update its transition position

Enums/Message/Title.html.name: Title
Enums/Message/Title.html.abstract: An ASCII String of exactly 4 characters. A list of available titles can be found in Skarhoj’s protocol description under the column “CMD”.

Enums/Message/Do.html.name: Do
Enums/Message/Do.html.abstract: Namespace for messages that request an action from the ATEM switcher

Enums/Message/Did.html.name: Did
Enums/Message/Did.html.abstract: Namespace for messages that inform a certain action did complete

Enums/Media.html.name: Media
Enums/Media.html.abstract: Namespace for functions that relate to media encoding

Enums/VideoSource.html.name: VideoSource
Enums/VideoSource.html.abstract: A unique identifier for a video source of an ATEM switcher

Classes/Switcher.html#/s:4Atem8SwitcherC.name: init(eventLoopGroup:setup:)
Classes/Switcher.html#/s:4Atem8SwitcherC.abstract: Start a switcher endpoint that controllers can interact with.

Classes/PureMessageHandler.html#/s:4Atem.name: when(_:)
Classes/PureMessageHandler.html#/s:4Atem.abstract: Attaches a message handler to a concrete Message type. Every time a message of this type comes in, the provided handler will be called.

Classes/ContextualMessageHandler.html#/s.name: when(_:)
Classes/ContextualMessageHandler.html#/s.abstract: Attaches a message handler to a concrete Message type. Every time a message of this type comes in, the provided handler will be called.

Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.name: init(socket:eventLoopGroup:setup:)
Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.abstract: Start a new Controller that connects to an ATEM Switcher specified by its IP address.

Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.name: init(ipAddress:eventLoopGroup:setup:)
Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.abstract: Start a new Controller that connects to an ATEM Switcher specified by its IP address.

Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.name: send(message:)
Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.abstract: Sends a message to the connected switcher.

Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.name: uploadStill(slot:data:uncompressedSize:)
Classes/Controller.html#/s:4Atem10Contro.abstract: Upload an image to the Media Pool

Classes/ConnectionState.html.name: ConnectionState
Classes/ConnectionState.html.abstract: Stores all relevant information to keep an ATEM connection alive.

Classes/ContextualMessageHandler.html.name: ContextualMessageHandler
Classes/ContextualMessageHandler.html.abstract: A utility to parse RawMessages and call their attached handlers within a certain context.

Classes/PureMessageHandler.html.name: PureMessageHandler
Classes/PureMessageHandler.html.abstract: A utility to parse RawMessages and call their attached handlers.

Classes.html#/s:4Atem13MessageParserC.name: MessageParser
Classes.html#/s:4Atem13MessageParserC.abstract: A utility to parse binary messages and look up corresponding message handlers.

Classes/Switcher.html.name: Switcher
Classes/Switcher.html.abstract: An endpoint to interact with BMD ATEM controllers like “Atem Software Control” or any of the hardware control panels.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
